title: Complete Genome Sequence of Carnobacterium gilichinskyi Strain WN1359T (DSM 27470T)

sections.abstract: We report the complete genome sequence ofCarnobacterium gilichinskyistrain WN1359, previously isolated from Siberian permafrost and capable of growth under cold (0 degreesC), anoxic, CO2 dominated, low pressure (0.7 kPa) conditions in a simulation of the Mars atmosphere.
